Application: Responsbile for Managing SubPrograms for different analysis

Asset: Used to define an asset and populate asset with all data from multiple data sources

UniverseManager: Responsible for organzing and filtering asset groups for multiple exchanges

PortfolioManager: Responsible for weighting and loading assets into a portfolio and do calculations 
on the porfolio as a whole.

Algorithms: responsible for defining the calculations that one can possible do on any series

PlotManager: responsible for organzing visual plots for reusability

FeatureGenerator: Responsible for Extracting features from a single timeSeries

ModelManager: Responsible for training and managing models and saving configurations

StateManager: Responsible for maintaining persistent data in a database
